channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Asahi Linux Still Working on Apple M3 Support, M1n1 Bootloader Going Rust
item.description:
Asahi Linux developers have kept working on new kernel patches and some being upstreamed for Linux 6. Asahi Linux developers are also working on moving toward the Rust programming language with their important m1n1 bootloader for Apple Silicon. Asahi Linux developers have also made progress on getting more games working on Apple Silicon devices.

Read more

item.title: Show HN: A fast, privacy-first image converter that runs in browser
item.description:
The file never leaves your browser. Image converter FAQEverything you need to know about switching image formats in your browserIs the image converter free to use. Will the converter reduce image quality.

Read more

item.title: Traffic Light Protocol
item.description:
Information sharing happens from an information source, towards one or more recipients. Recipients may therefore not share TLP:RED information with anyone else. Recipients may share TLP:AMBER i.

Read more
